form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP, N-600 ( (Rev. 10-20-59)

full_text: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERV Love 1060 Broad Street Newark 2. New jersey Form approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R105.8 FEE STAMP UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE RECEIVED APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP NEWARK, N.J. & N SERVICE 1961 UNDER SEC. 341 OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATIONALITY ACT UN 22 AM 10: 1961 JUL -5 Take or mail this application to: AM 9:05 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE: DATE June 21, 1961 (Print or type) Eva Miller nee Zigman (Name) (Maiden name, if any) 82 Paulison Avenue ALIEN REGISTRATION (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, ''in care of ) Passaic New Jersey NO. # 12 315057 (City) (State) SEE INSTRUCTIONS ON PAGES 5 AND 6 I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am a citizen of the United States of America (1) t was born in Rovna Russia on Sept. 23 1906 (City) (State or Country) (2) My personal description is: Sex F FAIRO (Month) (Day) (Year) ; complexion light color of eyes blue ; color of hair grey ; height 5 feet 0 inches; weight 150 pounds; visible distinctive marks none Marital status: Single; Married; Divorced; Widow(er) 1-23-11 (3) 1 arrived in the United States at New York, N-Y on Feb. 1910 (City and State) (Month) (Day) (Year) under the name Eva Zigman by means of Rotterdam s/s Mieuw AMSTERDA (Name of ship or other means of arrival) on U.S. Passport No issued to me at 3 on (Month) (Day) (Year) (4) Fill in this block only if you arrived in the United States before July 1, 1924. (a) My last permanent foreign residence was Royna Russia (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at Amsterdam (City) (Country) (c) I was coming to Samuel Zigman at Passaic, New Jersey (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was livin (d) I traveled to the United States with my mother Rosa Zigman (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) 13-6-3570 (5) have been absent from the United States as follows (if no absence, state "None"): None Date departed Date returned Name of ship, or of airline, railroad company, bus company, or Place or port of entry through which you retarned to other means used to return to the United States the United States 2 Tussenty Trips to Canada IV + 7/60 IMs. JF M no other a (6) filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT: DO NOT WRITE BETWEEN THE DOUBLE LINES BELOW. CONTINUE ON NEXT PAGE ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books Name Manifests Manner Marital status Age (Sig of person making search) Form N-600 (Rev. 10-20-59) (1)
